EmailTemplate.name: RE: Referral from Linda King - Introducing Turbonomic (1494334238.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Referral from Linda King - Introducing Turbonomic (1494334238.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Yusef, I wanted to bring the following email to the top of your inbox and see if you might have some time to meet this week or next for a quick 15 minute initial conversation as you mentioned to reach out early May. How does your calendar look over the next couple of weeks for a quick initial discussion? Currently I am available any time after 2pm EST both Wednesday and Thursday of this week. Let me know if that might work for you. Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Wednesday, April 26, 2017 10:36 AM To: 'Green, Yusef' <Yusef.Green@ElizabethArden.com> Subject: RE: Referral from Linda King - Introducing Turbonomic Yusef, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I just left with an email as well to see if we could drill down a time to discuss the projects you have coming down the pipeline and how Turbonomic may be able to help. Linda mentioned that you and the team were going from an outsourced model to possibly bringing the infrastructure on premise and I wanted discuss how we can help with infrastructure optimization, allowing you and the team to save on hardware and software infrastructure costs. Lower Infrastructure Costs with Turbonomic <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE9SdsbKLFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhkHlK3XnXYkqTfYa1rfb1p3cNk66CEymQApJOBnVGKHEYKHSEqYR6Je759qQnSKZYLcRq%2DqHfKBbMKzgUSgeUG4bS7f5S48EOU9lPo9huEGXV57e2vwFaGBrR%2DtfMntng9uAQfSsb%2DzwH%2Dk4URnHYU0tZ9tAZZ%2DsZRcNBG6j7aWAPZ%5FY2qH7FvT5Omqtrfqfl7Yw0O2dx6SkbjeFi%2DJZyadHtl8CShgwxqaC9oDh4LMOIhyyWOiC1zUcECfC2CgSou4nwI8pJA3Nuothu2ZG3QGAX5kkKn3jW5CJUr53iHn%5FcK8xD%5FBwnvyLpteGOTX%5FXShliyS8nZunYZSaEPG4Y%2C/j0lWcMDMLFlNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%5FKjgaMKFq8idLP8XBZq8W%2Dd8LDW%2DnUjXVuYvXfptfeeVY8%5FlorvCDzzIOrselu13APEhLE1UpNyLeZbA3gS%2DqOZ4lTQKU7mnUNpM2ji1FhrIXwoE%2C]]> Solving the SDDC Management Problem <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE9SdsbKLFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhkHlK3XnXYkqTfYa1rfb1p3cNk66CEymQApJOBnVGKHEYKHSEqYR6Je759qQnSKZYLcRq%2DqHfKBbMKzgUSgeUG4bS7f5S48EOU9lPo9huEGXV57e2vwFaGBrR%2DtfMntng9uAQfSsb%2DzwH%2Dk4URnHYU0tZ9tAZZ%2DsZRcNBG6j7aWAPZ%5FY2qH7FvT5Omqtrfqfl7Yw0O2dx6SkbjeFi%2DJZyadHtl8CShgwxqaC9oDh4LMOIhyyWOiC1zUcECfC2CgSou4nwI8pJA3Nuothu2ZG3QGAX5kkKn3jW5CJUr53iHn%5FcK8xD%5FBwnvyLpteGOTX%5FXShliyS8nZunYZSaEPG4Y%2C/j0tQdc3KIllNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqp0MMx3gdxfKHbLVPth91eEZsxKvqRDRQZHZcs0whcGa2YfY5B%5FfBQDk%2DmFSvtj6PWaoABLrl4yP518KP4ingwi%5Fa4mH%5F9An0lU1RJMByyP7wK0jvJJZotdTqt92rXJI9ytwcwjOxc8IX5dreu3Fqh%2DXHBqWaqcQJZ]]> Do you have 30 minutes over the next couple of week to discuss? Best, James Wilcox Turbonomic Yusef GreenChief Architect, Infrastructure Services200 First Stamford PlaceStamford Connecticut 069021-203-462-5705 From: James Wilcox <james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE9SdsbKLFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhkHlK3XnXYkqTfYa1rfb1p3cNk66CEymQApJOBnVGKHEYKHSEqYR6Je759qQnSKZYLcRq%2DqHfKBbMKzgUSgeUG4bS7f5S48EOU9lPo9huEGXV57e2vwFaGBrR%2DtfMntng9uAQfSsb%2DzwH%2Dk4URnHYU0tZ9tAZZ%2DsZRcNBG6j7aWAPZ%5FY2qH7FvT5Omqtrfqfl7Yw0O2dx6SkbjeFi%2DJZyadHtl8CShgwxqaC9oDh4LMOIhyyWOiC1zUcECfC2CgSou4nwI8pJA3Nuothu2ZG3QGAX5kkKn3jW5CJUr53iHn%5FcK8xD%5FBwnvyLpteGOTX%5FXShliyS8nZunYZSaEPG4Y%2C/h0tUecDNdlBQuVN5sfaYL6z%2D0SLJdpuno5xpHOXk3cEx1EF9PO%5FANR7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpC8QdqMfOwWdRa1aNeIRe0di71jovjRYBfZ6V7jepOx6H0gEYS%2DNaGiHvlCEM7RzQ%5FQEPOTQ%2C%2C]]>> Date: Friday, February 3, 2017 at 11:00 AM To: Yusef Green <Yusef.Green@ElizabethArden.com <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE9SdsbKLFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhkHlK3XnXYkqTfYa1rfb1p3cNk66CEymQApJOBnVGKHEYKHSEqYR6Je759qQnSKZYLcRq%2DqHfKBbMKzgUSgeUG4bS7f5S48EOU9lPo9huEGXV57e2vwFaGBrR%2DtfMntng9uAQfSsb%2DzwH%2Dk4URnHYU0tZ9tAZZ%2DsZRcNBG6j7aWAPZ%5FY2qH7FvT5Omqtrfqfl7Yw0O2dx6SkbjeFi%2DJZyadHtl8CShgwxqaC9oDh4LMOIhyyWOiC1zUcECfC2CgSou4nwI8pJA3Nuothu2ZG3QGAX5kkKn3jW5CJUr53iHn%5FcK8xD%5FBwnvyLpteGOTX%5FXShliyS8nZunYZSaEPG4Y%2C/h01QcMzHdlBQuVN5scWMMazr0RLSf52mm5lxAO3n0Moq0WlsdunBdkLghYxcF4YNceaVXFAIJrFK%2DgZ7K%2DunV5Nl36FHJBexcm35rrTQYad3W7liytBproOK4GlU8vuVwFfIE2gnQX1ZY0POTfpzoA%2C%2C]]>> Subject: Referral from Linda King - Introducing Turbonomic This is an EXTERNAL email. Exercise caution. DO NOT open attachments or click on links from unknown senders or unexpected email. Hi Yusef, After speaking with Linda this morning she mentioned that you are the best person to reach out to when it comes to initiatives that are going on within Elizabeth Arden’s infrastructure. She mentioned that you are very busy with the Revlon acquisition but I was still hoping that we could set up a ten minute intro call so that I can learn how to best support you and the team at Elizabeth Arden. Here at Turbonomic we feel that the reactive approach to managing your virtual infrastructure should be a thing of the past. The biggest problem with the reactive approach is that it introduces risk into your environment, allowing for applications and therefore users to suffer from slowness. As you know, this has a significant effect on the business. Turbonomic’s economic scheduling engine allows for our customers to be proactive instead of reactive allowing them to see the following benefits: · Reduce the amount of time spent caring for/maintaining your virtual infrastructure by leveraging software to analyze resource demand in real-time across capacity, placement, and configuration· Act as a single pane of glass across your environment; across any technology · Providing executable actions around placement and sizing that can be leveraged in a manual or automated fashion to prevent resource-contention & application delay· Increase IT agility/compatibility to meet the business requirements· Reduce future costs on servers, storage, and licensing, while maximizing the effectiveness of your current environment How does your calendar look over the next couple of weeks to align a discussion? I am confident it will be worth your time. Best regards, James Wilcox Sales Representative – Southeast Turbonomic <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE9SdsbKLFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhkHlK3XnXYkqTfYa1rfb1p3cNk66CEymQApJOBnVGKHEYKHSEqYR6Je759qQnSKZYLcRq%2DqHfKBbMKzgUSgeUG4bS7f5S48EOU9lPo9huEGXV57e2vwFaGBrR%2DtfMntng9uAQfSsb%2DzwH%2Dk4URnHYU0tZ9tAZZ%2DsZRcNBG6j7aWAPZ%5FY2qH7FvT5Omqtrfqfl7Yw0O2dx6SkbjeFi%2DJZyadHtl8CShgwxqaC9oDh4LMOIhyyWOiC1zUcECfC2CgSou4nwI8pJA3Nuothu2ZG3QGAX5kkKn3jW5CJUr53iHn%5FcK8xD%5FBwnvyLpteGOTX%5FXShliyS8nZunYZSaEPG4Y%2C/j0lWcMDPLVlNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%5FKjgaMKFq8idLP8XBZq8W%2Dd8LDW%2DnUjXVuYvXfptfeeVY8%5FlorvCDzzIOrselu13APEhLE1UpNyLeZbA3gS%2DqOZ4lTQKU7mnUNpM2ji1FhrIXwoE%2C]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE9SdsbKLFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhkHlK3XnXYkqTfYa1rfb1p3cNk66CEymQApJOBnVGKHEYKHSEqYR6Je759qQnSKZYLcRq%2DqHfKBbMKzgUSgeUG4bS7f5S48EOU9lPo9huEGXV57e2vwFaGBrR%2DtfMntng9uAQfSsb%2DzwH%2Dk4URnHYU0tZ9tAZZ%2DsZRcNBG6j7aWAPZ%5FY2qH7FvT5Omqtrfqfl7Yw0O2dx6SkbjeFi%2DJZyadHtl8CShgwxqaC9oDh4LMOIhyyWOiC1zUcECfC2CgSou4nwI8pJA3Nuothu2ZG3QGAX5kkKn3jW5CJUr53iHn%5FcK8xD%5FBwnvyLpteGOTX%5FXShliyS8nZunYZSaEPG4Y%2C/h0tUecDPdlBQuVN5sfaYL6z%2D0SLJdpuno5xpHOXk3cEx1EF9PO%5FANR7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpC8QdqMfOwWdRa1aNeIRe0di71jovjRYBfZ6V7jepOx6H0gEYS%2DNaGiHvlCEM7RzQ%5FQEPOTQ%2C%2C]]> This message and its attachments are intended only for the designated recipient(s).
